page.title: 11 Village Life.
page.content: Life in a village is very different from that in a town. The roads are less busy and most people know everyone else. You have village shops, pubs and a Doctors surgery. Everyone in the village is very friendly and if someone is ill people ask if there is anything that they can do. The countryside around our village is very beautiful with lots of trees and sweet smelling flowers. Also there are lots of farms, and they have cows and sheep grazing in their fields. In our village they have a Sunday school and a playgroup. Also they have clubs in the village hall like badminton, majorettes and many others. Village life is very quiet and peaceful.
